name: Ninja Gaiden Black
description: Ninja Gaiden, the commercial and critically acclaimed cut and slash action game, took the action genre by storm with its unique and innovative game play, killer story and mind-blowing graphics. Now gamers can experience even more of Ryu Hayabusa’s deadly artistry in Ninja Gaiden Black, the newest installment in the Ninja Gaiden series. Boasting new difficulty levels including “Ninja Dog” level and “Master Ninja” level, the new Mission Mode with a massive number of new action-packed missions to complete, and colossal amounts of special bonus features including content from both Hurricane Packs 1&2, the new Ninja Gaiden Black is the must have game for all action lovers from casual to hardcore.
